website_summaries.verdict: Stimulates babies' senses while working on hand-eye coordination.
pros: Uniquely made just for younger babies, these clear plastic balls each hold either an animal friend or a moving toy
The penguin and turtle are weighted to always remain upright, which will surprise and delight babies
Made with textured rings for little hands to grip, babies will love to throw, roll, float, and balance the balls
Parents love the mold-proof design with no holes, meaning they dry quickly and stay clean
cons: Some parents have noted that moisture has gotten inside after multiple uses

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toys, but Not as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The toys are fine. My eight-month-old likes them. But instead of receiving four different toys, I received two packages of the same two toys: the whale and the spinner. I didn't receive the turtle or the little stick with the blue and red balls. The toys themselves are nice. They are big enough to be fun but also not too big that my son can't grasp them and pick them up at his age. But the product is not as described. Be prepared to get two sets of the same two toys, rather than four different toys.
customer_reviews.author: TriciaCKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Already wet inside
customer_reviews.text: We just started using these a few days ago and one of them is already full of moisture. Extremely disappointing since I got these to replace squirt toys that retain moisture. It’s a shame because my son seems to really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get 4 different toys as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Mostly bummed because I thought I was getting 4 different toys, based on the photos. Instead it's 2 packages of 2 -- each with the same 2 toys. Too much of a pain to return/exchange, but just be aware that you might get 2 packages of the same 2 toys.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: These leak and allow water to be trapped inside ... Not a healthy choice for babies
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought these would be great, based on the reviews. However, in the short time that I've had them, my granddaughter has used them at my house probably only a total of four times. I noticed that "bubbles" has water inside. With no way to open it and dry it out, I threw it away, knowing that soon mildew/mold would be growing inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: tmb

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, no holes for mold!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace my sons moldy bath toys. These are great! -they float very well -have NO holes for mold/mildew build up -cute! -good price -dry quickly The only con I can see is that they seem a bit large for a smaller baby. My son is 2 and they are a good size for him.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany ralston

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bath Toy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bath toys as part of a birthday gift for my 1 year old nephew. I like that these floating bubble bath toys are easy for him to pick up out of the water. He likes to bang the toy bubbles together and make them splash in the water. He really enjoys playing with them and these bath toys are a nice change from other bath toys that can get water stuck in them and mold. These bath toys are super cute, fun to play with, well made and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: allmyloveVAL

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These were cute at first but we ended up throwing half of them away as moisture got into the center and started to mold. Would be nice if they were sealed better so water would not leak into the center.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Seavers

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: These toys came in a pack of 2. Four toys all together. I have read some reviews here about having duplicate toys, this did not happen to me. We have received 1 golden shell turtle, 1 cute penguin, 1 eye catching spinner, 1 rattler with a few beads inside. All of these bubble toys make a nice rattle noise when shaken. No signs of water getting inside the toys which make it extremely nice to just rinse off and set aside to dry. I didn't have to excessively squeeze out water and worry about mold growth like other squirt toys we have. This is a very awesome bath toy, my 1 yr old really enjoys playing with them!
customer_reviews.author: send2kiki

customer_reviews.title: Cute but water gets inside
customer_reviews.text: The animals inside are super cute, my sons love playing with these in the bathtub. However they are flawed and water gets inside. With only being used for about 2 months the balls are already foggy. So at some point I expect there will be mold inside.
customer_reviews.author: Solei G.

customer_reviews.title: FUN FOR IN AND OUT OF THE BATH
customer_reviews.text: At a library story time, my one year old became OBSESSED with a small ball that rattled. So, I ordered him these for his birthday and he LOVES them. I was debating between these and the balls for racing down towers but these can go in the bath so they were the winner. I received all the designs pictured and put two in his play box and two in the bath. The penguin and turtle are weighted which keeps them right side up. The penguin and ball and stick balls rattle but the other two don’t. I wish they all made noise. The red one is a spinner which is kind of cool.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Little Hands to Grow Into
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute bath toys. I especially like the variety and the bubbles. I was searching for a bath toy for my baby who is four months old - something that was safe enough for her to play with that she could grab onto well. These are the perfect size to grab two hands around for her and I don't need to worry about chocking hazards or mold. They seem to be pretty durable as we've knocked them around quite a bit taking them in and out of the tub. And, it seems that they are the perfect toy that she can grow into and continue to use as she gets older as well.
customer_reviews.author: tcs112Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: 6 mos old loves these!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for the first time tonight with our six-month-old son, who has a tendency to reach outside his over-the-sink tub and get into trouble. Well no more! These were a smash hit and made bath time a real treat again. We also will be using these for playing on the floor. He can't quite crawl yet, though he can scoot, and he had a ton of fun chasing these around the floor! Easy to wash, easy to store, baby loves them. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Miller

customer_reviews.title: fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Play time in the bath is a really fun time for me and the baby. I got this to make it even more fun in the tub. Baby seems to like it, although it is a bit too big for him to grip, so it can be a bit frustrating. However, the quality is pretty good and innovative. It is leak proof and solidly built. Baby's interest level for it seems to be up and down though.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 6 month old!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my granddaughter who just turned 6 months old and she loves them. They are a size that she can grasp and hold and she is totally intrigued by the little penguin, whirling leaf, turtle, little balls and the twirling cutout inside the various balls. She carefully studied each one and focused on them and how they moved. She was interested in each ball and held them, looked at them and rolled them. I didn't get to see her use them in the bath, but I'm sure she loved then there also. With amny toys to choose from, she loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Not-picky/selective

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Engaging
customer_reviews.text: These bath toys are so cute and engaging! My 13 month old son especially likes the one with the spinner and the one with the little stick & beads. They float nicely in the tub and as long as there aren't bubbles in the bath, are bright and easily catch my son's attention. I love the animal ones. The turtle has a pretty gold shell and my older kids think the turtle & penguin are really cute. They have kept the water out from the inside and are really easy to clean, although being in the bathtub, haven't gotten all that dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought these as a bath toy for my 8 month old son who is currently obsessed with all toy balls, but these are fun for him to play with outside the tub as well! I received all four different balls as the product describes, I read some reviews that did not receive the proper items, but maybe this problem has since been resolved? These are easy to grab, engaging, and durable! I admittedly have not had these long enough to not against mildew/mold buildup in bathtub usage- but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: EME

customer_reviews.title: Bath time treasure!
customer_reviews.text: We Absolutely love them! My baby boy has so much fun with these in and out of the bathtub. They are perfect size for a 7 month old to hold on to and play with. He likes to look at the item inside the ball and of course tries to stick the ball it in his mouth. So far I have not seen any water leak inside them and he is pretty rough with them inside/outside of the tub. They do get scratched up pretty easy (we have tile floor) so dropping and rolling them on tile is not advised. I will be buying another set! I wish they had different sets to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: FaithfullyMTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My kiddos absolutely love these.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a birthday present for our daughter when she turned one year old about four months ago. We have only actually used one in the bathtub, which she thinks is fun, but wound up actually keeping the other three as regular toys because she and her seven year old brother love them so much! They are very cute, durable even despite them banging the toys around constantly, and were a great value for the price. I'd definitely buy these again or recommend them for others.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Purchased product (set of 4) is not what I received!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! I received the set of 4 but for whatever reason I received the same 2 turtles and same 2 yellow stick/balls!! I did NOT receive the one with the orange spinner or the penguin!! Not pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: R Valdez

customer_reviews.title: These remind me of fidget toys!
customer_reviews.text: These are actually really cool! They remind me of fidget toys for older children and adults - they're just fun to shake and roll and play with! The contents of each ball spin or move (or don't move, while the ball moves around it) in different, interesting ways. My favorite baby toys are the ones that have staying power beyond the baby stage. I think these qualify! I'm really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz L.

customer_reviews.title: Great in and out of water!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 4-Pack of these and have 2 in the bathroom, and 2 on his play mat. Our son loves to shake these and try to “chew” on them. I love that they are completely water-tight and I don’t have to worry about mold growing inside of them. We took one along on a recent beach trip, and sand washed off very easily. They float well in the water and I think he will enjoy these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: LeaH1109

customer_reviews.title: They would be 5 star worthy if......
customer_reviews.text: they were all water resistant. I'm sure it was just a manufacturing defect, but one of them lets in water somewhere so it will be growing mold soon. Aside from that one, simple issue, they're great. But I didn't pay for three bath balls, I paid for four. And we only have three. So that's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ARose9210

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I received all four in great shape. No leaks, no issues, My son throws it out of the tub and so far have been holding the roughness well. The colors are nice and soft, have a rattling sound which my son enjoys. Gives me a peace of mind that there is no mold growing like other bath toys. The only con is that there are no more than these four designs unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Caben

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathtime, but get very cloudy/not able to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was eyeing these toys for a while and finally hit the button when they went on sale. They're good quality, cute, and my toddler enjoys them. However, they became really "cloudy" after the second bath. I've tried different methods of cleaning, but it won't completely go away. I'm disappointed because I really liked them, but the strange design/unable to clean is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: mck4517

customer_reviews.title: Very well made bath toys for infant
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 9 month old granddaughter, and she loved them. She played with them while sitting in her highchair and my daughter (her mom) said they were bath toys and that she would play with them in her baths. I felt they were very well made and the animals inside were very well made also. I am very pleased with this purchase and would happily purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cletius Weimer

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BATH TOYS
customer_reviews.text: Just one of those things where it's just up to the baby and their preference. Gave it 4 stars based on our baby's interaction and interest. Baby likes playing with them in her bath and keeps her interested. I bought them because they are BPA, Phthalate and Formaldehyde free based on the response I received from Munchkin customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SEOTINEZTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: One change would make them perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful, adorable, durable little balls. They are perfect for bath time as well as out of the bath. I love how the penguin and turtle are weighted so they stay upright when the ball rolls around. The one thing I wish they had was rubber/grippy sides. I was expecting the colored ring around the ball to have been grippy for little hands to hold but feels like the same material the ball it made out of. Overall excellent bath time toys!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Boo

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: They float. They don’t have little holes or anything where mold can grow. The toys inside spin/move. My daughter likes to bang them together (she’s 9 months) so they are durable. They are clear so if water were ever to leak inside, you would be able to see mold. No cons really. My daughter can’t really bite/mouth them.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie T

customer_reviews.title: A bathtime hit for 5-month old
customer_reviews.text: 5-month old baby loved these immediately at bathtime. Her hands are a bit too small to grab with just one hand, but she kicked and splashed until she got it close enough that she could grab it with both hands. It was so cute to watch! Ordered a set of 4 and received 2 packages of 2, which was fine as all balls are of a different dessign. The balls float and they are very cute. They appear sturdy. I washed them in warm water with a mild soap before giving them to baby.
customer_reviews.author: MsTee

customer_reviews.title: SO FUN
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old LOVES these "bubbles". I love the variety of colors and items in the bubbles so we can learn while we play. He loves splashing the water and trying to get them to his mouth. Super easy to clean and I haven't had any water get into the actual balls yet (it's been about 3 weeks and we take a bath every day). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bies

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of others, I received two of the same toys. Both were the penguin pack. Really would have liked to see the other set with the turtle. With that being said, my daughter still loves these! We have to keep a set for the tub and keep the other out for her to play with! Can’t speak yet to durability because we haven’t had them long, but so far I have washed them and had them in the tub with no problems and no water getting inside!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for water play and non-water play
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loves these. She plays with them on her playmat both reaching for them on her tummy and on her back. She also loves them in the pool. We like that the inside spins, it keeps her attention. They also are shiny inside. The clear ball doesn't get cloudy or gross in water. Simple toys but one of my very high demands baby's favorite toys!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Has my 8 month old niece mesmerized!
customer_reviews.text: I sent these to my sister for my 8 month old niece and she is absolutely obsessed with them. She got all 4 (two packages) and she won’t leave them alone! They haven’t been used in water yet but she has them in her mouth nonstop and is fascinated by the things spinning aside that she can’t reach. Lots of fun & the packaging was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loved them right away! I sent these as a surprise gift for Easter. They arrived on Saturday instead of Sunday! My daughter washed them and handed baby Jude (10 months) the one with the turtle. He was enthralled playing with it on his play mat. Later he had them all in his bath, kicking the water to make them bounce around! So sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian A.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son for christmas (he is currently 20 months old) after reading some great reviews! I just got them today and I think my son will really enjoy them! The picture shows 4 different designs in the balls but many reviews said they only got 2 different designs. I figured I would just return them if I got duplicates but I got all 4. Very happy to see that they came how they were advertised. I am only giving this 4 starts right now as we have not tried them out yet. I will update my review after christmas and we use them with final thoughts on them then!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Horn

customer_reviews.title: Missing some of my order
customer_reviews.text: Although the product appears to be as described I wasn’t sent all the ones I ordered. I ordered 2x a four count of bath toys and received 1 full set and the 1 half of a set. I’m hoping this will be rectified ASAP because these are Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Rattle rattle
customer_reviews.text: I received two different sets of these bath toys so each ball was unique. They are small but the right size for an infant. I like how they rattle when shaken. They are very cute and so far, none of them have gotten water inside. So i make sure to take them out of the bath as soon as we are done and set them somewhere to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Good bath toy, baby loves
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these bath toys, the objects inside spin so they are lots of fun. We have had for a while and do not see any condensation or mold. He throws them out of the tub like a wild man and they have never cracked.
customer_reviews.author: tell me about it

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable little balls that young children will love to play with! I have a one-year-old and he smiled SO BIG when we opened the package. They are cute, clear. (so that you can see the animals on the inside of the ball good). There is also a thick plastic seam were the ball comes together, (I assume this is to prevent water from entering the ball). I haven't tried them in the tub yet, but I think they will be a fun toy that doesn't have the mold issue that some bath toys do! I also spray my son's bath toys with vinegar after each bath! Vinegar helps to eliminate any potential mold and is a safe disinfectant!
customer_reviews.author: Tess Bess

customer_reviews.title: Cute but would probably have bought something else if in a store
customer_reviews.text: Cute designs inside the toys. My only complaint is that they are just a little too big for little baby hands, which makes them hard to pick up in the bath. Also, just as a note of caution: they are extremely hard plastic. There is no give at all so if your child pounds them against the bath, it could be damaging.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fun and long lasting (7months ongoing)
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing with these for almost 7months now. No sign of water getting into the spheres so no mold issues like most squirt-toys. My son is 11 months old now. He loved these from early on when he struggled to grab them even with both hands, to now, still chasing and grabbing them--only with one hand. Every one of the spheres has something to make them fun; all equally played with.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B

customer_reviews.title: You can't miss with these!
customer_reviews.text: I had balls like these for my children and they were some of their favorite toys. I was thrilled to find these for my grandson. He loves them! They are made well and are the perfect size for little hands. They are fun in and out of the tub. The seams on the balls are covered with a smooth plastic with little bumps for sensory stimulation. The little objects inside the balls are adorable, colorful, and move and spin, capturing a child's attention and fascination. These toys would entertain any infant, toddler, and preschooler. They were delivered promptly and were packaged well to prevent damage. I highly recommend these toys!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Montanarella

customer_reviews.title: baby approved. Parent appreciated.
customer_reviews.text: This is our babies go to bath toy. They float. They rattle. They shake. They spin. They have colors. They are interesting. Our baby wants to splash and inspect these toys to see if they will fit in her mouth. They will not fit in your babies mouth unless they are part snake and have a unhingable jaw.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for months now and baby still loves to play with them. They're just hard enough to hold onto that she's perpetually entertained. I love them because unlike other bath toys they won't grow mold or make a mess. They come in 2 packs of 2 (one animal per pack) so I can see how some people might have gotten 2 of the same set if the warehouse grabbed the wrong second set. I don't know that it would bother me, but I'm assuming they could be shipped back for replacement with the opposite set if it was an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kanne

customer_reviews.title: A miss for us
customer_reviews.text: These managed to capture the attention of my toddler for a grand total of 5 minutes. Since then he's been far more interested in box they came in. I rarely ever buy plastic toys but was looking for something for the bath. I bought these on the strength of all of the positive reviews. They were cheap, but still wish I'd saved my money.
customer_reviews.author: N B.

customer_reviews.title: So cute, great purchase worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, these are just so cute! I bought these and some farm animals, and let my kids use dry erase crayons in the tub. Bathtime is so much fun with these cute things floating about! The turtle has a gold gem-like shell, and each toy is in thick plastic that does not let water inside. I use bath bombs and Crayola Bath Drops, and this plastic does not get colored by any of those products. I recommend these if your children like bath toys- most do! The more, the merrier! :)
customer_reviews.author: C Nanni

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to grasp, cute, and has lots of moving bits or rattling noises to attract little attention spans. Not hard for babies to pick up. Does not get too slippery when wet. Floats well, will not get nasty mildew inside, doesn't break when dropped. Good plaything for floor time as well as bath time.
customer_reviews.author: sparklepony

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. Great price. Very sturdy. I only gave it four stars though because my toddler likes to throw balls, and since these look like balls, she throws them, and they're pretty hard so they'd hurt someone or break something easily.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBearLenson

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, but after only one use, I realized one of them is not waterproof. There are no cracks I can see.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toys for LO
customer_reviews.text: These bath balls are so cute! They are one pig my toddlers favorite bath toys ! They are the one toy that is the easiest to clean which is a must ! They have been through a lot of play time, being tossed around, and stuff being dropped on them all while surviving. I'm glad my little one can enjoy these during his bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Takira Wendel

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Our kiddo loves these! In fact, they’re usually to be found in our living room and not the bath tub because he plays with them so much. They’ve been nice and watertight so far, even when they were left floating in his little blow-up baby pool for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! My 3 year old and 10 month old both love them (to be honest, I kind of love them too). Quality is better than I expected- very clear plastic, cute characters and pieces inside, and a silicone ring around the outside making them easy for my youngest to grasp. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, durable and delightful!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, durable and delightful! We had to laugh because we are keeping these in a net bag that is hung up on the bath wall, my husband noticed that the little penguin was staring out at him through the net with its cute little face. Anyway, our 11 month old daughter loves them, they float and hide in her bubble bath and she loves to be surprised by which one she grabs. They are a little big still for her hands so she has to use both hands until she gets a little bigger, just a thought for younger babies.
customer_reviews.author: FancifulShopper

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I think these are a good quality for 10 dollars. My son plays with them outside the bath too. I got them at around 8 months and he is 13 months now,he doesn't play with them as much anymore but they've lasted well, they don't get water inside and I will keep them until he is older
customer_reviews.author: Jess 000

customer_reviews.title: Found out these are cheaper at Walmart. They don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Found out these are cheaper at Walmart. They don't fill with water which is a plus, and they are quality made. Heavy but buoyant. Two big for fisher price ball rolling toys if you had planned to use them for replacement balls. Problem is my daughter didnt seem very engaged by them, maybe the shiny turtle for two seconds. They were a bit too large for her hands. She'd rather play with stacking cups in the tub. We bought these at 11months currently 15M and they sit there.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bath toy
customer_reviews.text: Good detail on the stuff inside the balls, very sturdy balls, floated in bathwater as advertised. My baby was mesmerized by the spinning one. The turtle looks cooler than pictured. Good exercise in grabbing for my little one. The outer colored ring is kinda grippy(rubberish) which helps baby grip them. Very happy with quality, packaging, and timeliness of order.
customer_reviews.author: E. S

customer_reviews.title: Good clean fun!
customer_reviews.text: Good fun for bath time. Pros- - These balls float around in the bath water and provide interest - they are sealed units so they don’t retain water. They are hygienic and easy to clean - the toys inside each ball move around and hold a toddlers attention Cons - Nothing so far!
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Fav bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! They have the same balls in swim class and she gets so excited when she’s able to grab one. Cute creatures inside. Durable and sturdy plastic. Have only had for a few days, but doesn’t look like water will seep through
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not four toys, you get duplicates.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the photo you should get four different toys. I got two of the same pack. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Well-made Bath Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is Dr. Bob's wife...I ordered this item. My granddaughters loved this bath toy! The baby (age 1) and the almost 4 year old both had a great time with them in the tub...and the baby played with them on the floor as well. Perfect size for little hands and well made. I wish they had more little bubbles to add to the collection. This is a definite must have for water play!
customer_reviews.author: DrBob

customer_reviews.title: 7 month old loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy cute! These come packaged in two separate plastic bags. The toys are a bit small but perfect for baby's hands. They are the cutest things ever. The turtle has a shiny gold shell and the penguin is adorable. My grandson is 7 months old and fascinated with things within things. He loves looking at the toys inside the plastic balls. They seem very well made . He hasn't played with them in the tub yet but from other reviews I understand these don't let the water seep inside. A really sweet toy!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carlson

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute and my son would have loved them if I'd gotten them a few months ago
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and my son would have loved them if I'd gotten them a few months ago. At 14 months though he found them boring. Ideal age range for these seems like it would be 6-12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Young Jang

customer_reviews.title: Plain Jane bath toy
customer_reviews.text: Ok bath toy. They float..make noise. But there so plain. It gives ur child something to play with in a bath but after a while it'll get old. They don't do anything. Its just a floating ball with something inside. Also I'm sure if dropped (outside of the back) the plastic will crack.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my son some bath toys that wouldn't get gross or moldy and these are perfect. He's almost a year old and he's been playing with them for months and still loves them. They were smaller than I was expecting but not so small that they could be a choking hazard. They are the perfect size for him to grasp in his hands and to practice his motor skills with.
customer_reviews.author: Shaybe

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly and came two per retail style packaging. My one year old loves these both in and out of the bath and has no trouble grasping them- though they aren't small enough to go in the mouth. They pop right up after being dunked, without any water leaking inside. The inside of the ball is fun and vibrant - each with its own unique movement. I'd buy these again and I think they would make a great add on gift.
customer_reviews.author: GypsySoul

customer_reviews.title: A bigger hit with my daughter than even expected
customer_reviews.text: Stuff you want to know: My 9 month old daughter LOVES these. I am pretty sure she crawls into the bathroom (during non-bath time) to try and get them from the tub toy organizer. They float right on top of the water and the fun toys inside flip around which is super exciting to her (and me, don't judge).
customer_reviews.author: Elana

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toys
customer_reviews.text: We've had these now for a few months and our daughter loves them. She throws them around and they haven't broken, so I'd say they've held up well so far. Haven't had any issues with water getting in them. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hetchler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have not received my gift to my great-granddaughter that was suppose to be delivered on 12/14/2019. I am very disappointed because every one else will have a present and she will not. Now what am I suppose to do?
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: These little balls are perfect for little ones. They rattle and make noises. You can twist and turn them and the little animals stay right side up. You can roll them as well as your little one can take them in the bath and they float on top of the water. You get four of them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice toys but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bath toys because they are totally closed and would not retain water from the bath. They are great toys, but are a little heavy. When I put my two boys in the bath together I am always worried that one of these will hit someone and hurt them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana DeMoor

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy but quality diminished in short time
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, but they seem to let water in them slightly. They started to look older and the plastic was not so clear after just a few weeks of use. I was expecting them to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: sarah evans

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and several other bath toys over 1 year ago. The others got mold and had to be thrown away. My toddler loves these and they are a required part of our bath time routine. They are well made, durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He does end up getting frustrated because these aren't as easy as his Oball cups to put in his mouth ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when my son was just born, but we're just now able to start using them at 5 months. His little hands are finally big enough and coordinated enough to get a hold of them. The little things inside the balls spin really well and he enjoys looking at them. He does end up getting frustrated because these aren't as easy as his Oball cups to put in his mouth and chew on, though. Makes great kiddie pool toys too.
customer_reviews.author: Booknerd28Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I used them on a baby shower wreath. They ...
customer_reviews.text: I used them on a baby shower wreath. They come in a plastic bubble I cut out the half bubbles leaving a small lip on it hot glued pipe cleaners around it stuck the balls back in with some glue dots , Looks cute and adds movement to my wreath
customer_reviews.author: S. Coakley

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My son play with these at every bath time. And sometimes is rough, throwing them around. He's thrown them hard enough they hit the bottom of the tub. And he's tossed them out playing. So far so good. Hasn't cracked and they don't leak.
customer_reviews.author: BatChell

customer_reviews.title: Water has not gotten inside
customer_reviews.text: So far water has not gotten inside but I noticed it can get fogged up so that the inside is hard to see clearly which results in my baby losing interest. So far it’s easy to clean and as long as water doesn’t get inside, there shouldn’t be mold issues!
customer_reviews.author: Jinee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Water does NOT get inside these toys. Which is great. A lot of bath toys take in water as they are in the tub and you can never really clean those out which can cause the toys to get moldy inside... gross. You will not have that happen with these! Fully enclosed toys, the pieces inside move as your little one plays with them. And yes. They float perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C.

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the opportunity to use these with my grandson yet...he will be 6 months. But I think they will make bath time even more fun. Great size so no choking and little bumps on them for grip support.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Very cute sensory toys. My son plays with these daily. They are very durable, as they have been dropped on tile floors over 100 times and still are intact. They float in water, roll on the floor and make great rattles too.
customer_reviews.author: MoonDreamer715

customer_reviews.title: Cool & Well Made
customer_reviews.text: My 1 1/2 year old son loves these at bath time. He pulls them under the water to watch them pop back up, splash's them so they float away then pulls them all back in. Great toys and well made for my rough son, no leaks, easy clean up making me very happy with this purchase. Recommended for anyone with a toddler . If my review was at all helpful to you please click the relevant button, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for baby 6-12 months
customer_reviews.text: Love these and decided to use them for everyday toys for my daughter rather than bath toys. She plays with them while in her high chair and while playing on the floor. Perfect size for her hand Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jswife4life

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves them
customer_reviews.text: I would have posted a pic but I don't think my infant daughter will forgive me in the future. She loves the toys and bath time has turned into a significantly fun play time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Onyango

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart less than 4 months later and my son almost choked
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last a full 4 months before it fell apart and I had to rush my son out of the bath before he tried to eat the little beads. Really disappointing and really dangerous. The penguin inside is the perfect size for choking. He put it in his mouth but then I couldn’t get my finger inside to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Regan

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize these were so big, like almost the entire palm of my hand BIG so I was quite surprised but love them anyway! My little guy likes them as well, tho they can be a little hard for him to grip from time to time. I think as he gets older, that won’t be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: xoNishizawa

customer_reviews.title: fun for baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hasn't even used these in the bath yet, but she'll play for a long time just holding them, banging them together, watching the shapes spin inside. Great, simple toy for a baby!
customer_reviews.author: richa521

customer_reviews.title: great for play outside of water
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my granddaughters favorite toys !!!!she uses them outside the tub she likes to shake them and see the toys inside move .
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne touhey

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: We didn't think they would ever make them to the bath but when they finally did he loved them even more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby girl has SO much fun at bath time!
customer_reviews.text: I just knew this would add a dimension to her bath time and I was correct. I'm going to record her laughter one of these days (when I know I won't get soaked). GREAT bath toy!
customer_reviews.author: Dimples 22

customer_reviews.title: Did not float in the water
customer_reviews.text: These toys did not float in the water like they state. For some reason they kept sinking in the water and my baby niece was unable to play with them. Maybe I got a defective batch.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie M.

customer_reviews.title: i use them as everyday toys
customer_reviews.text: water doesnt get in them is a huge plus and my daughter for some reason wants to break them open I can't tell you how many times she threw them on the floor they don't break not even a crack
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Good bath time toys! Or anytime toys.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 5 month old to grasp. She likes to rattle them and throw them in the tub. They hold true. No water has gotten inside of them.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Fun for toddler baths
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 1 yr old as a stocking stuffer. He loves it and plays with them frequently at bathtime. He is quite rough with them, banging them on floor and tub, and they are still in original condition. Good quality and good fun.
customer_reviews.author: HathiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: My toddler likes balls and these are her newest bath time favorites. For some reason I was under the impression that the balls were inflated soft plastic but they are actually hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Pena

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy plastic
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, but the plastic got cloudy really easily. We’ve only used them like 3 or 4 times and the plastic is already cloudy and I have cleaned them off after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey McGriff

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Fun, interactive and just plain perfect for little hands. Whether floating in a tub or just as a toy on the floor your baby will find these little balls a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy Diz

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much and so do my daughters they are the perfect size for my baby, she was about 8 months when I got them and they fit perfectly in her hands. Please buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Loo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect tub toys. They float. The inside spins around and captures attention. They do not leak. My granddaughter plays with them in and out of the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They're easy to clean and she's been throwing them around the house so they are pretty sturdy haha! Definitely will be buying extra for other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Kuskiko

customer_reviews.title: They spin so well!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my friends son who was turning 1 and he absolutely loves them! He plays with them out of the bath just as much too. They spin so well he loves watching them! Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jlshapiro89

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We've had these forever and they still have not molded, cracked, or gotten water on the inside. The colors are still vibrant too. They definitely have a long life!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Franchuk

product_meta.title: Munchkin Float and Play Bubbles Bath Toy, 4 Count
product_meta.description: Does your little one love things that rattle, bobble, spin and shine? Then fun is sure to pop with munchkin's float and play bath bubbles. Each floating bubble has a unique center toy that rattles, bobbles, shines and spins. They are sized for little hands to hold and help teach hand eye coordination as babies learn to reach, grasp and shake the bubbles. Colorful rings move freely around the bubbles giving lots of textures and movement for your little one to explore. With these float and play bubbles, bath time fun is about to bubble up.
feature_bullets: Includes two fun characters and two whirly toys that spin and rattle
Each bubble helps stimulate baby's sense of sight, hearing and touch
Textured rings move freely around the bubbles
